name: Psychic Adept
description: You have honed your mind to harness psychic power.
benefit: You gain the ability to cast a 0-level knack from the psychic classâ€™s spell list. You can cast this spell three times per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability is equal to your character level, and the save DC is equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier.
special: You can choose this feat multiple times, choosing a different knack each time.
